name: Grick Alpha
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Stone Camouflage: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.Multiattack: The grick makes two attacks: one with its tail and one with its tentacles. If it hits with its tentacles, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.
actions.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Tentacles: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Beak: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.
